user.title: Tile Account
user.description: Enter your Tile account credentials to connect your Tile devices.

reauth_confirm.title: Re-authenticate Tile
reauth_confirm.description: Your Tile session has expired. Please re-enter your credentials.

error.cannot_connect: Failed to connect to Tile API

abort.already_configured: This Tile account is already configured

play_sound.name: Play Sound
play_sound.description: Play a sound on a Tile device via Bluetooth.

tile_id.name: Tile ID
tile_id.description: The UUID or name of the Tile to ring.

volume.name: Volume
volume.description: The volume level for the ring tone (low, medium, high).

duration.name: Duration
duration.description: How long to play the sound in seconds (1-30).

song_id.name: Song
song_id.description: The song/ringtone to play (0=Default, 1=Chirp, etc.). Uses the Tile's selected song if not specified.

refresh_tiles.name: Refresh Tiles
refresh_tiles.description: Refresh all Tile device data from the Tile API.
